article_title: The Demise of Estate Tax Planning Sends Lawyers Scrambling For New Work

article_metadata.description: With the market for trusts withering due to the expansion in exemptions from the federal estate tax, estate attorneys are turning to finding ways for rich clients to shuffle money to relatives with the aim of reducing income tax liability.
article_metadata.author: Business in the Beltway

og.description: With the market for trusts withering due to the expansion in exemptions from the federal estate tax, estate attorneys are turning to finding ways for rich clients to shuffle money to relatives with the aim of reducing income tax liability.
